title: Sparkling Cucumber and Ginger Refresher

ingredients.content: 40 g fresh root ginger, cut in round slices (2 mm)

preparations.content: Place cucumber, ginger, limes and mint leaves in mixing bowl then blend <b>1 min/speed 10<b>. Strain through a fine sieve into a serving jug.
Add sparkling water to serving jug and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Unstrained, this drink would retain more fibre and will be even more nutritious.
The limes can be left unpeeled for additional nutrition.
Replace sparkling water with still water.
A good soda, antacid and revitalising.
